text: Living DNA is a UK-based company that specializes in DNA testing and analysis. They provide detailed ancestry information using a unique analysis process and linked DNA. The company conducts three types of DNA analyses: autosomal, Y-chromosome, and mitochondrial. Living DNA is known for its comprehensive ethnic breakdowns for regions around the world. While they do not offer genealogical services, they provide insights into a person's origins and migration patterns. Living DNA was founded in 2016 and has partnered with Findmypast to offer extensive family history research. It is important to be aware of privacy concerns associated with DNA data shared online. == References == Category:Companies of the United Kingdom Category:Biological databases
title: Living DNA
